page.title: 10Edith Borthwick School
page.content: The{Edith Borthwick School}is near{Bocking Church Street.}The school is for moderately and severely mentally and physically handicapped children. The children all have to be transported by the school bus or by car. The school was named after a lady who did a lot for special education but died in a road accident. There are{157}children at the school and the age range is{4_19. There are{17}teachers including the Head, Deputy and Senior Mistress. All the children have transport for getting to school. The activities for the children include swimming, sailing, canoeing, camping, horse riding, country dancing and they attend music festivals.
